reviewText: Love Cruise starts out as a silly comedy with a lot of cartoonish humor.  It eventually becomes a romantic comedy with a lot of cartoonish humor.  As the product description mentions, it's about paparazzi and celebrities.  There is a four-member girl group who go on a cruise to perform onboard.  A trio of paparazzi go on the cruise as well, to get pictures, of course.  The boyfriend of one of the girls as well as a pair of competing paparazzi show up, too.  Some of it works, and some doesn't.  The ending was very predictable.
